## ğŸ—’ï¸ É´á´‡á´„á´‡ssá´€Ê€Ê á´ á´€Ê€s

â˜ `API_ID` - Get your API_ID from [my.telegram.org](https://my.telegram.org/apps)<br>
â˜ `API_HASH` - Get your API_HASH from [my.telegram.org](https://my.telegram.org/apps)<br>
â˜ `BOT_TOKEN` - Bot Token of your spam bots.<br>
â˜ `ADMIN` - Your User ID<br>
â˜ `DATABASE_URI` - Mongo Database URL from https://cloud.mongodb.com/<br>
â˜ `DATABASE_NAME` - Your database name from mongoDB. Default will be 'my'<br>

> View Thumbnail 
* `/viewthumb` View Thumbnail 
> Delete Thumbnail
* `/delthumb` Delete Thumbnail
